pageContext.claim: “Democrats are pushing for a socialist takeover of health care that would strip you of the doctor and coverage of your choice.”
pageContext.analysis: Some candidates running for president have advocated "Medicare for All," a single payer health care plan, but many others oppose it, including the leading candidate, former vice president Joe Biden. Trump's rhetoric is fear-mongering, since there is no evidence senior citizens would be put at risk if all Americans were on a universal health care plan like Medicare.
